author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of Dravidar Viduthalai Iyakkam lodged a complaint with the Tiruchengode Rural police demanding action against persons who threatened a college student to give up her love with a boy of lower community. Recently, an audio went viral on social media networks in which unidentified persons threatened an engineering college student belonging to upper caste to give up her love. The persons in the audio also threatened to kill both the girl and the boy.

Stating that the audio will create community clash, members of Dravidar Viduthalai Iyakkam lodged a complaint with the police.
title: Call to initiate action
